summary: This is a series of simple alteration spells which briefly stop time up to 15 seconds at a time. Whether you need to dodge a blast of dragonfire or make a pin-cushion out of a guard, these spells have got you covered.
descriptionHtml:
This is a series of simple alteration spells which briefly stop time up to 15 seconds at a time. Whether you need to dodge a blast of dragonfire or make a pin-cushion out of a guard, these spells have got you covered. The spell tomes can be bought from farengar and should be available from most spell tome salesmen. If you run into any issues, leave a comment and I\'ll see what I can do. Feel free to rate and subscribe.

Future Plans:
- Allow user to defy fluid dynamics and run across water
- Experiment with other methods of the slow time function: \"Time Bubble\"? 
- Custom slowed ticking sound effect?
- \"Time Warp\" will envelope the user in a stasis effect, speeding up time around the caster
- Your idea here
author: TheAdmiral

files.name: Time Freeze Spells v105
files.changelogHtml: - Added new spell \"Repair Timeline\", fixes errors with users getting stuck in slowtime effect when used (Tome price set at 1 gold)
